markdownRemark.html:
Idea

Drawing inspiration from Zen Garden, I wanted to create what it is like as a digital love letter. It is one sided, so the player must piece together the responses from the other person.

Game

game

This will be updated with more content because I would like to explore the idea more but I don’t feel comfortable with my own pixel art ;-;
